english.segment1: Rags to riches, so they say. She got her break and she found her way. I admit this may sound strange. This girl is dancing a different way
english.segment2: If they only knew how You've mended. My broken wings, now I'm flying
english.segment3: Your love is Heaven on Earth. I'll shout it out to all of the world. There's no doubt my greatest dream has come true. Just to be loved by You
english.segment4: Whom You set free is free indeed. I've got the strength of my God in me. Well, You restored my dignity. Oh, completely, You love me
english.segment5: If they only knew how You've mended. My broken wings, now I'm flying
english.segment6: Your love is Heaven on Earth. I'll shout it out to all of the world. There's no doubt my greatest dream has come true. Just to be loved by You
english.segment7: I'm in Heaven, Heaven on earth. Promise to promise, this must be Heaven on earth. Glory to Glory, this must be Heaven. Heaven on Earth
english.segment8: Well, if they only knew how You mended. My broken heart, now I'm living
english.segment9: Your love is Heaven on Earth. I'll shout it out to all of the world. There's no doubt my greatest dream has come true. Just to be loved by You
